name: Zenith 60 Pierce Stationary Table
descr:
60-Zenith Pierce Stationary Table

This efficient stationary table incorporates our unique Key Dimension headpiece. This exclusive headpiece was designed for positioning patients for 3rd dimension and cervical circumduction correction. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Key Dimension Headpiece positions patients for 3rd dimension and cervical circumduction correction 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Swing Away Abdominal- Single Tension 
Thoracic Drop
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/ lo-force mechanism 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Chrome Base Finish 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Table Length 62 
Table Height 20, 22, 24, or 26 
Table Width 24 
Cushion Width 18 
Table Weight 185 lbs. depending on options
